WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription:
Adecco er markedsleder, når det gælder vikar- og rekrutteringsløsninger.
Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

Sådan er det både globalt og lokalt, hvor vi har 12 kontorer fordelt rundt omkring i landet. Dermed er vi både tæt på dig og vores kunder.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We're looking for TIG-welders in Odense SØ.
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We're looking for TIG-welders are sought for industrial companies in Odense SØ.

Do you have experience with TIG welding and are quality conscious? Then we're looking for you!

The positions in Odense SØ are with an industrial company that specializes in bulk goods. Among them, they sell products such as dampers, cyclones, cell locks, dividers, screw conveyors etc.

Your primary job will consist of TIG welding of various components.

Your future colleagues are a responsible team that works independently and understands the importance of being a team that helps each other.

Working hours:

Monday - Friday from kl. 06.30 - 14.30 but with the possibility of flexibility in working hours.

Qualifications & Qualities

You have experience / knowledge of TIG welding.

You are quality independent.

You speak Danish, English or German.

You have an understanding of safety, quality and efficiency.

You are meeting stable and have a positive attitude.

If you have experience with stainless beige welding it is an advantage but not a requirement.

It is also an advantage if you are a trained blacksmith, but not a requirement either.

Throughout the hiring process, you are connected to Adecco consultants who ensure that your interests are taken care of, and who are always ready to help you. This is a try & hire process where you are employed through Adecco in the first period which is typically between 1 - 3 months, after which you will be permanently employed by the company afterwards.

We offer

Salary according to qualifications, as well as holiday pay and pension.

A good working environment for permanent employment.

Applicable agreement.

The position is with accession as soon as possible. We're hold ongoing conversations, so don't hold back applying already today!

If the above has piqued your interest, please apply for the position. If you have any questions, you are always welcome to contact Nikolaj Holm on +45 3838 1148 in the period 09.00 - 15.00 on weekdays.

You are also welcome to send an e-mail to Nikolaj.holm@adecco.dk
